slides.title: Welcome to the FPVaI UKF Nitra internship records system
slides.text: A modern tool for students and companies that keeps internship records in one place.

slides.title: For students
slides.text: Track your internship status, communicate with mentors, and receive feedback — all in one place.

slides.title: For companies
slides.text: Approve internships, assign tasks, and evaluate students without paperwork.

slides.title: How does the system work?
slides.text: Register, choose an internship, and receive confirmation and evaluation from your mentor.

slides.title: Internship filtering
slides.text: Filter internships by field of study, location, job type, and availability.

slides.title: Get started today
slides.text: Register or log in and start tracking your internship.
